--support: --- Output diagnostic information for use in GitHub issues.

check.#desc: Checks for PyUp Safety security vulnerabilities and against PEP 508 markers provided in Pipfile.

clean.#desc: Uninstalls all packages not specified in Pipfile.lock.

install.#desc: Installs provided packages and adds them to Pipfile,installs all packages from Pipfile.

open.#desc: View a given module in your editor.

run.#desc: Spawns a command installed into the virtualenv.

scripts.#desc: Lists scripts in current environment config.

shell.#desc: Spawns a shell within the virtualenv.

sync.#desc: Installs all packages specified in Pipfile.lock.

uninstall.#desc: Uninstalls a provided package and removes it from Pipfile.

verify.#desc: Verify the hash in Pipfile.lock is up-to-date.
